content.question: One genetic change associated with the disorder results in a methionine-to-valine substitution at amino acid position 425 of the encoded polypeptide, as shown in Figure 1. Using the codon table in Figure 2, predict a DNA point mutation that will result in a methionine-to-valine substitution.

frqParts.text: One genetic change associated with the disorder results in a methionine-to-valine substitution at amino acid position 425 of the encoded polypeptide, as shown in Figure 1. Using the codon table in Figure 2, predict a DNA point mutation that will result in a methionine-to-valine substitution.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
